text: Lepetodrilus shannonae is a species of small, deep-sea sea snail, a hydrothermal vent limpet, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Lepetodrilidae. ==Description== ==Distribution== This species occurs at methane seeps in deep water off the Congo River. ==References== Category:Lepetodrilidae Category:Gastropods described in 2009
title: Lepetodrilus shannonae
